name: Trouble In Snowdrop
description:
Snowdrop Village is about to hold their annual Spring Festival, but the villagers are having some trouble cooperating and getting things in working order! Help Rayna the Rabbit solve each issue so that the Spring Festival can go off without a hitch!

Control:

w,a,s,d, - Movement

shift - sprint

e - Interact

esc - exit

f12 - toggle fullscreen

Credits:

Writer - Kelsey https://twitter.com/kelseymwrites

Friendly Scribbles by kmlgames - https://kmlgames.itch.io/friendly-scribbles

FC's Dialogue System by Friendly Cosmonaut - https://marketplace.yoyogames.com/assets/6076/fc-s-dialogue-system

Made using Game Maker Studio 2
